actions.text: Pursuant to the order of the House on Thursday, Aug. 5, 1993, Mr. Natcher called up H. Res. 245 and asked for its immediate consideration.
DEBATE - Pursuant to the order of the House on Thursday, Aug. 5, 1993, the House proceeded with one hour of debate on the resolution.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous  order of the House.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the disposition of the Senate amendments to H.R. 2667, a bill making emergency supplemental appropriations for relief from the major, widespread flooding in the Midwest for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1993, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 2667 (emergency supplemental appropriations for flood relief in the Midwest) and agreeing to the Senate amendments thereto and to motions to dispose of such amendments.

titles.title: Providing for the disposition of the Senate amendments to H.R. 2667, a bill making emergency supplemental appropriations for relief from the major, widespread flooding in the Midwest for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1993, and for other purposes.
